Package com.zieglersoftware.num

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BigUtil
    Provides many static methods for more conveniently working with BigDecimal and BigInteger.
    Rat
    Immutable class that represents a rational number; i.e., a number that can be expressed exactly as the ratio of two integers (including whole numbers).
